name: Welcome!
content: Hi there, and welcome to About That! This is a fan-project based on Karen McManus's book "One of Us is Lying", hope you like it!
author: [Administrator]

name: Secret welcome!
content:
If you're seeing this, then you have discovered this secret post! Yay! I'm not sure what to put here,
so I'll just say that I hope you enjoy the site!
